definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
also written 機槍|机枪/machine gun
governing body of an autonomous territory
also written 重機槍|重机枪/heavy machine gun
also written 輕機槍|轻机枪/light machine gun
government (viewed as an organization)/institutions of government/government office

sentences.english: To be responsible for the party-masses work of Administration and its directly affiliated institutions.
sentences.chinese: 負責局機關及直屬單位的黨羣工作。

sentences.english: And 73 percent of them are frontline jobs, in city-level units or below.
sentences.chinese: 其中73%是市級或以下機關的基層職位。

sentences.english: When a public security organ demands the arrest of an offender, it shall obtain the approval of a people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關要求逮捕人犯的時候，由人民檢察院批准。

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同時也束縛了司法機關的手腳，造成寬縱罪犯的後果。

sentences.english: The MOFTEC or the SETC is hereinafter uniformly referred to as the investigation organ.
sentences.chinese: 外經貿部和國家經貿委，以下統稱調查機關。

sentences.english: Most boys keep them locked in their lockers and they're turned off.
sentences.chinese: 大多數男孩子把手機鎖在儲物櫃裏，並把手機關掉。

sentences.english: The cost for arbitration shall be borne by the losing party if it is not otherwise ruled by the arbitration authority.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁費除仲裁機關另有裁決外均應由敗訴方負擔。

sentences.english: The organs of self-government of national autonomous areas shall apply the principle of democratic centralism.
sentences.chinese: 民族自治地方的自治機關實行民主集中制的原則。

sentences.english: Good relationship with the local labor bureau and government agencies.
sentences.chinese: 與本地勞動局及政府機關保持良好關係。

sentences.english: Deep-seated reason lies in utilitarian assessing by the law enforcement agencies.
sentences.chinese: 深層原因是對執法機關功利性的考覈造成的。

sentences.english: The Shareholder shall cause the Company to report such appointment to the original examination and approval authority for the record.
sentences.chinese: 股東應責成公司將該委任報原審批機關備案。

sentences.english: Recruiting departments shall take measures to facilitate citizens' registration for examination.
sentences.chinese: 招錄機關應當採取措施，便利公民報考。

sentences.english: Artificers treat mastery of magic like a technical skill.
sentences.chinese: 機關術士將魔法的掌握視爲一種技術性的能力。

sentences.english: He desired to obtain a position in the Civil Service.
sentences.chinese: 他想望在政府行政機關裏謀到一個職位。

sentences.english: The machine gun hailed over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 機關槍的火力壓得我們擡不起頭來。

sentences.english: The public security organ shall carry out examination in the course of transportation of precursor chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關應當在易製毒化學品的運輸過程中進行檢查。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to handle/to take care of/to punish
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
